        <div class="sidebarBlock sidebarBlock--navList sidebarBlock--brands sidebarBlock--mobileCollapsible">
         <h5 aria-expanded="false" class="sidebarBlock-heading" data-collapsible="#brands-navList" data-collapsible-disabled-breakpoint="medium">
          Popular Brands
         </h5>
         <ul aria-hidden="true" class="navList" id="brands-navList">
          <li class="navList-item">
           <a alt="Chocolate Shoppe" class="navList-action" href="https://icecreamsource.com/brands/Chocolate-Shoppe.html" title="Chocolate Shoppe">
            Chocolate Shoppe
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="navList-item">
           <a alt="Ben &amp; Jerry's" class="navList-action" href="https://icecreamsource.com/brands/Ben-%26-Jerry%27s.html" title="Ben &amp; Jerry's">
            Ben &amp; Jerry's
           </a>
          </li>

                   </span>
                   <span class="icon icon--ratingEmpty">
                    <svg>
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-star">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </span>
                   <span class="icon icon--ratingEmpty">
                    <svg>
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-star">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </span>
                   <span class="icon icon--ratingEmpty">
                    <svg>
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-star">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </span>

                    <svg>
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-star">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </span>
                   <!-- snippet location product_rating -->
                  </span>
                 </p>
                 <p class="card-text card-text--brand" data-test-info-type="brandName">
                  Graeter's
                 </p>
                 <h4 class="card-title">
                  <a href="https://icecreamsource.com/graeters-chocolate-coconut-almond-chocolate-chip-pint/">
                   Graeter's Chocolate Coconut Almond Chocolate Chip (Pint)
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <div class="card-text card-text--price" data-test-info-type="price">
                  <div class="price-section rrp-price--withoutTax price-section--withoutTax ">
                  </div>
                  <div class="price-section">
                   <span class="price-now-label">

                   <span class="price price--withoutTax" data-product-price-without-tax="">
                    $7.49
                   </span>
                  </div>
                  <div class="price-section non-sale-price---withoutTax price-section--withoutTax ">
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="card-text card-text--summary" data-test-info-type="summary">
                  New, limited edition Graeter's Chocolate Coconut Almond Chocolate Chip. Escape to a tropical paradise of frozen delight, combining flakes of grated coconut and our gourmet bittersweet chocolate...
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="card-aside">
                 <div class="card-text card-text--price" data-test-info-type="price">
                  <div class="price-section rrp-price--withoutTax price-section--withoutTax ">
                  </div>

                    $7.49

           </div>
           <div class="tabs-contents">
